MenuItem.Name: Biscuits and Gravy
MenuItem.Description: This is a hearty breakfast favorite. Biscuits served with hot sausage gravy

MenuItem.Name: The All American Breakfast
MenuItem.Description: Two fried eggs, Sausage (patty or link), crispy bacon, pancakes and maple syrup

MenuItem.Name: Pork Rinds
MenuItem.Description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

MenuItem.Name: Bacon Wrapped Hot Dog
MenuItem.Description: Take one hot dog, wrap it in bacon and cook until the bacon is nice and crisp. Then place it in the bun.

MenuItem.Name: Grilled Cheese and Ham
MenuItem.Description: Sliced ham, American cheese between two slices of White bread buttered on the outside and then fried.

MenuItem.Name: Glazed Doughnut
MenuItem.Description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar glaze.

MenuItem.Name: Jelly Doughnut
MenuItem.Description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar, and filled with strawberry jelly.

MenuItem.Name: Hushpuppies
MenuItem.Description: Cornbread dough deep fired served with a variety of dipping sauces.

MenuItem.Name: Hamburger
MenuItem.Description: Despite the name, ground beef cooked over a charcoal grill with a side of French Fries.

MenuItem.Name: Cheeseburger
MenuItem.Description: Same as the Hamburger with a side of cheddar cheese added.

MenuItem.Name: Meatloaf and Mashed Potatoes
MenuItem.Description: Meatloaf, Mashed Potatoes, Brown gravy and Broccoli.

MenuItem.Name: Jambalaya
MenuItem.Description: Creole style Jambalaya, with chicken, andouille sausage, tomatoes, onions, crawfish and rice. Good enough to have you Fais-do-do-ing

MenuItem.Name: Pot Roast
MenuItem.Description: Beef with vegetables slow cooked for a minimum of 8 hours

MenuItem.Name: Southern Fried Chicken with Waffle
MenuItem.Description: Southern fried chicken, savoury waffles and smokey maple syrup

MenuItem.Name: Crawfish Etouffee
MenuItem.Description: Thick Crawfish stew served over Dirty Rice

MenuItem.Name: Dirty Rice
MenuItem.Description: American long grain rice with finely chopped chicken livers and giblets.

MenuItem.Name: Pazooki
MenuItem.Description: A large 6 inch round chocolate chip cookie, served warm with 3 large scoops of vanilla ice cream.

MenuItem.Name: Banana Split
MenuItem.Description: One banana cut lengthwise served with scoops of vanilla, chocolate and strawberry ice cream and topped with Pineapple, chocolate and strawberry syrup.

MenuItem.Name: Sweet Potato Fries
MenuItem.Description: Sweet potatoes, thinly sliced and fried in Canola Oil

MenuItem.Name: Grits
MenuItem.Description: Creamy cornmeal served with butter

MenuItem.Name: Succotash
MenuItem.Description: Our version consists of: corn, lima beans, green pepper and sweet red peppers. Cooked in a casserole to form a light pie crust

MenuItem.Name: Rocky Mountain Oysters
MenuItem.Description: Bull calf testicles, lightly seasoned, covered in flour and deep-fried. Served with cocktail sauce
